steps: step 2: Login at Page_login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_executions --> navigate to Page_test-planning
step 5: At Page_test-planning click on hyperlink_test_run_list --> navigate to Page_grid
step 6: At Page_grid click on hyperlink_tests --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-cases
step 7: At Page_test-design_test-cases click on hyperlink_planning --> navigate to Page_releases
step 8: At Page_releases click on hyperlink_requirements --> navigate to Page_requirements
step 9: At Page_requirements click on hyperlink_team_project_test_reports_test_design_t --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-design_traceability-report
